description: Sweet, tart raspberries meet rich chocolate flavours in this winning brownie recipe. Tip: replace milk for dark chocolate if you're after a deeper flavour.
name: Milk Chocolate Raspberry Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add caster sugar, eggs and vanilla to bowl and mix well to combine. Add flour and cocoa and stir until just combined. Fold in 150g chopped chocolate and pour batter into prepared pan. Sprinkle with raspberries and bake for 35 minutes. Melt remaining chocolate (50g) and drizzle on top to serve.
